name: Dolly (Incl. Nightmare Mode + Ultimate Nightmare Mode)
name_original: Dolly (Incl. Nightmare Mode + Ultimate Nightmare Mode)
description:
• I am an Indie Game Developer. This game is a Survival Horror Game in which you need to survive till 6AM . Close the doors if the monster opens it. Secrets Included :)
  • In Nightmare Mode you need to go to the light so that you won't lose your sanity and you dont have a flashlight. The enemy is more aggressive too.
  • In Ultimate Nightmare Mode you don't have any light and you need to listen to the sounds in order to close the doors.
  • This is the part with the Dlc's Nightmare Mode and Ultimate Nightmare Mode.
  • If you find any bugs please comment  
  • Thanks
